title: Evie: An Autobiography
description: An Autobiography by Geneva LemonOn the outside, Evie is living a charmed life. Her family is wealthy, her father is devoted to her, and she is excelling at school. On the inside, however, Evie is keeping secrets; her father is narcissistic to the point of abuse, and her mother is becoming increasingly paranoid and violent.After calling out her father for years of neglect, he responds by kicking her out of the no money, no help, just gone. Taken in by a kindly grandmother, Evie is introduced to the other side of her heritage, and begins a racial, cultural, and sexual awakening that will leave her transformed...
author: Geneva Lemon
